comments: Number of edges of a complete 5-partite graph of order 5n, K_n,n,n,n,n. - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Oct 18 200110 times the squares. [From _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 13 2008]Sequence found by reading the line from 0, in the direction 0, 10,..., in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized heptagonal numbers A085787. - Omar E. Pol, Sep 10 2011
links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = A000290(n)*10 = A001105(n)*5 = A033429(n)*2. [_Omar E. Pol_, Dec 13 2008]a(n) = A158187(n) - 1. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 13 2009]a(n) = 20*n+a(n-1)-10 (with a(0)=0) [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
crossrefs: Cf. A001105, A033429. [From _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 13 2008]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Nov 08 2001
